long_description: Offering extra comfort in boats with taller seat backrests, Kokatat Bahia minimizes bulk and maximizes airflow for comfort on all-day paddles. Eco-conscious Gaia(TM) PVC-free foam is soft, flexible and won't break down in a wet environment. A great PFD for recreational kayakers, the variable thickness foam back with mesh panel eliminates discomfort and ride-up from taller seat backs. Durable 210-denier nylon oxford shell offers lasting comfort and performance. Adjustable shoulders with neoprene padding and a durable, non-slip surface sit comfortably across your shoulders. Mesh side and lower back panels with 2 strap adjustments per side and a side-release buckle waist closure dial in a secure fit. Large armholes and mesh panels allow unrestricted movement and airflow. Front-mounted 4-way lash tab and stretch mesh zippered pocket stow accessories for easy, quick access.
short_description: Offering extra comfort in boats with taller seat backrests, Kokatat Bahia minimizes bulk and maximizes airflow for comfort on all-day paddles.
